Face Lifting Treatments

Body Lab is a medical spa located in the heart of Seminyak, Bali. We offer a variety of beauty and skincare treatments customised to your needs. Our highly trained therapists are providing the safest procedures and imlpementing the latest technologies in the beauty industry.

Thermolift

Treatment

Thermolift is known as the most effective nonsurgical method for face rejuvenation. It is focused radio frequency that heats on different skin levels and causes the collagen to build up. It can influence independently shallow dermis, deep dermis and SMAS. BENEFITS: -Face contouring -Collagen and elastene production -Skin tightening and toning -Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles LONG-LASTING RESULTS -Clinically tested in extensive studies -Treatment time significantly reduced -Fast and easy to use, plug & play technology -No disposables

Muscle Stimulation

Facial

Muscle stimulation is one of the most effective ways to rejuvenate the skin. It’s a process of applying the pulsing nature of the currents to the facial muscles regeneration. The main effect is strengthened facial muscles, in a way, this procedure is a workout for the face. BENEFITS: -Corrects and lifts the face contour -Smoothes wrinkles -Tones & recontours face line -Reduces puffiness LONG-LASTING RESULTS -Balances out the muscular system -Increases blood circulation -Removes muscle spasms

Microcurrents

Facial

Microcurrent facial is one of the newest innovations in anti-aging industry. It works the facial muscles and rebuilds collagen in dermis layer. By sending soft waves through the skin microcurrent reaches and stimulates facial muscles. BENEFITS: -Improves facial and neck muscle tone -Lifts jaws and eyebrows -Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles -Reduces puffiness -Stimulates lymphatic drainage CLINICALLY PROVEN RESULTS -85% of the surveyed noticed the improvements of facial contour -80% reported their skin felt smoother -77% mentioned their face looked more toned

Radio Frequency

Fine Line Smoother

Radio frequency is a revolutionary treatment that strengthens, tightens and lifts the skin. RF stimulates the skin’s natural processes of collagen restoration resulting in smoother, tighter and younger looking skin. And the best thing is that the results are visible after the very first treatment. Radio frequency is quick, convenient and painless, immediately revealing its stunning effect. BENEFITS: -Lifted, firm and tightened skin -Produces collagen and elastin -Removes fine lines and wrinkles -Treats saggy skin & acne scarring LONG-LASTING RESULTS -More youthful appearance -Relaxing and painless experience -Firm plump and refreshed skin

Detox Facial

Comedo Extraction

Oxygeneo is 3-in-1 super facial which is provide you professional exfoliation,nurishment and oxygenation . Similar to microdermabrasion, the oxygeneo exfoliates the upper skin layer to remove dead cells, smooth and renew the skin, preparing it to receive active nutrients with our exclusive serum with fully nutrient-rich active ingredients.Oxygenation part is CO2 bubbles which gently burst on the skin surface creating a physiological response, sending oxygen-rich blood to the area, increasing capillary flow and skin metabolism. See younger looking skin after your first treatment. BENEFITS: - Renewed youthful glow - Increased collagen - Reduced hyper-pigmentation - Improved skin cell production - Reduce appearance of wrinkles

Ultrasound Facial

Peel off dead skin

Ultrasound facial is a skin cleansing procedure that involves a special device creating ultrasonic waves and high-frequency vibrations. It removes dead skin cells and rejuvenates epidermis. Ultrasound facial is recognized by experts as one of the most gentle face cleansing treatments that can significantly reduces acne, cleans clogged pores, smoothes wrinkles without causing any harm. BENEFITS: -Pores contraction -Dead skin cells exfoliation -Skin texture and skin tone improvement -Effective deep pore cleansing without aggressive mechanical influence. LONG-LASTING RESULTS -Gentle exfoliation of dead skin cells -Tightened and toned skin -Reduces puffiness -Increased cell metabolism

Combination Facial

Ultrasound + Detox

Combination facial is our signature facial combined of detox facial and ultrasound peel/microdermabrasion facial. It helps effectively remove dead skin cells and refine skin texture by revealing clearer, smoother skin. Combination facial includes few steps to cleanse your skin: deep facial cleaning, ultrasonic scrubber exfoliation or microdermabrasion tip, facial massage, blackheads extraction and pore cleansing, skin nourishment with calming alginate mask that also has anti-aging effect. BENEFITS: -Helps clear clogged pores, blackheads and pimples -Removes dead cells -Improves blood circulation and lymphatic drainage -Skin tone improvement LONG-LASTING RESULTS -Clean, toned and tightened skin -Diminished wrinkles and fine lines -Refreshing effect -Youthful appearance

Microdermabration

Peel off Pigmentation

Fruit Acid Peel

Shrink Pores & Fine Lines

Fruit acids are generally obtained by crop products like grapes, apples, lemons, oranges and sugar cane. Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) facial peel can help you get a fresher, more luminous complexion.As old skin cells shed, new cells grow, and when the old cells do not slough off, your skin can look dull and lifeless. This is the perfect time to add an AHA peel to your weekly beauty routine. You will notice a difference in your skin texture immediately. The procedure is fast and convenient, taking only about fifteen minutes. And with virtually no recovery time, you can be back to your normal routine the same day. BENEFITS: -help refine skin texture, -smooth fine lines - reduce the appearance of acne scars and environmental damage, -reduce pigmentation .
